channel.title: Richard Asante on Memento

item.title: Biography
item.description: Pharm Richard Asante (1978 -2024) “wwwwwwFor if we live, we live to the Lord, and if we die, we die to the Lord. Therefore, whether we live or die, we are the Lord’s” (Romans 14:8 NKJ) Childhood Life Sir Knight William Saawil Sopiimeh was born on 24th November, 1952 in Zambo Tangpour to Mr Zegr Sopiimeh and Madam Sopiimeh Wie (all of blessed memory). He was the second born and only son of his mother and the fourth child of his father.
